edu.umich.auth.cosign
Class CosignCookie

java.lang.Object
  edu.umich.auth.cosign.CosignCookie
public class CosignCookie
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for the encoding/decoding of a Cosign Cookie.

Author:
saxman

Constructor Summary
CosignCookie()
          Constructor for CosignCookie.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getCookie()
          This method will return the full cosign cookie (random bytes and timestamp).
 java.lang.String getNonce()
          This method will return the random portion of the cosign cookie.
 long getTimestamp()
          This method will return the creation timestamp of the cosign cookie.
static CosignCookie parseCosignCookie(java.lang.String cookieValue)
          This method will parse the given cookieValue parameter and attempt to extract the random bytes and creaton timestamp.
 java.lang.String toString()
          This method will return the full cosign cookie.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

CosignCookie

public CosignCookie()
Constructor for CosignCookie. This constructor will generate a new random service cookie and set its timestamp to the current system time.

Method Detail

getCookie

public java.lang.String getCookie()
This method will return the full cosign cookie (random bytes and timestamp).

getNonce

public java.lang.String getNonce()
This method will return the random portion of the cosign cookie.

getTimestamp

public long getTimestamp()
This method will return the creation timestamp of the cosign cookie.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
This method will return the full cosign cookie.

parseCosignCookie

public static CosignCookie parseCosignCookie(java.lang.String cookieValue)
This method will parse the given cookieValue parameter and attempt to extract the random bytes and creaton timestamp. This method will return null if the given cookieValue is invalid.
